name: SN2 Nucleophilic Substitution - Primary Halides
scope: Primary alkyl halides (methyl, ethyl, propyl, butyl) with nucleophiles. Works best with strong nucleophiles like hydroxide, alkoxides, thiolates, and amines.
limitations: Does not work with tertiary halides (E1/E2 favored). Sterically hindered primary halides may show reduced reactivity. Sensitive to solvent effects.
